page.title: 17Housing for the elderly.
page.content: {Purbeck Court}is a purpose-built complex adjacent to our school, Rothmans C.P.School.Our description takes the form of an advertising brochure. "If you are retired and are thinking of a new home, consider renting a flat at Purbeck Court. The rent is Â£22.00 a week exclusive of gas bills. It is{sheltered accommodation. There is a{community centre}where bingo, darts, snooker and coffee mornings are held every week. Inside each flat there is an emergency cord, which rings a bell in the warden's and the deputy warden's house or the office.There are 44 flats and 53 people. You have to do your own cooking, cleaning and washing.There is a laundry and a rota for its use. Mr.Doe, a resident, is the librarian. He also arranges visits and drives the coach.There are shops nearby.
